remarks: Raising an absolute value to a power less than one yields another absolute value.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abvcxp.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvcxp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvcxp.f $e |- G = ( x e. B |-> ( ( F ` x ) ^c S ) ) $.
abvcxp $p |- ( ( F e. A /\ S e. ( 0 (,] 1 ) ) -> G e. A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
